scripts.exe: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > chest && cat chest-pre >> chest && rm chest-pre && chmod +x chest
scripts.build: tsc && browserify --bare __build__/src/chest.js -o chest-pre && npm run exe
scripts.exe-dps: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dps && cat dps-pre >> dps && rm dps-pre && chmod +x dps
scripts.build-dps: tsc && browserify --bare __build__/src/dps.js -o dps-pre && npm run exe-dps
